reviewText: This was bought as a gift.  He said he enjoyed it.

Cook a incredibly juicy turkey in about 2 1/2 hours? YES! Simple techniques with amazing results. They show how and why a particular technique works; or does not work. Today's leaner cuts of meat can be very overcooked using Grandma or Moms' recipe. Easy ways to upgrade and fine tune your cooking without expensive, impossible-to-find ingredients.  The recipes are great! Fewer pots/pans and no need for "specialty" kitchen appliances. Treat yourself to this DVD and enjoy cooking !
